Activity commands operate on [Activity Executions](/activities#activity-execution) <span id="i-797cd194-ff64-4d16-a986-ad53429fd694" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">i</span><div id="preview-modal-797cd194-ff64-4d16-a986-ad53429fd694" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-797cd194-ff64-4d16-a986-ad53429fd694" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp<a href="/activities#activity-execution">/activities#activity-execution</a></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is an Activity Execution?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">An Activity Execution is the full chain of Activity Task Executions.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><a class="preview-modal-tag" href="/tags/term">term</a> <a class="preview-modal-tag" href="/tags/explanation">explanation</a></div></div>.

To run an Activity command, type `temporal activity [command] [command options]`

## complete

The `temporal activity complete` command completes an [Activity Execution](/activities#activity-execution) <span id="i-a814f787-af77-4ae6-b752-08e8ac60707c" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">i</span><div id="preview-modal-a814f787-af77-4ae6-b752-08e8ac60707c" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-a814f787-af77-4ae6-b752-08e8ac60707c" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp<a href="/activities#activity-execution">/activities#activity-execution</a></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is an Activity Execution?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">An Activity Execution is the full chain of Activity Task Executions.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><a class="preview-modal-tag" href="/tags/term">term</a> <a class="preview-modal-tag" href="/tags/explanation">explanation</a></div></div>.
Along with completing the Activity, the result given upon return can be set as well.

`temporal activity complete --activity-id=MyActivity --result=ActivityComplete`

Use the options listed below to change the behavior of this command.

- [--activity-id](/cli/cmd-options#activity-id) <span id="i-a360a6ad-cfce-4362-a407-dd47c99c9ba6" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">i</span><div id="preview-modal-a360a6ad-cfce-4362-a407-dd47c99c9ba6" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-a360a6ad-cfce-4362-a407-dd47c99c9ba6" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp<a href="/cli/cmd-options#activity-id">/cli/cmd-options#activity-id</a></div><div class="preview-modal-title">temporal activity-id</div><div class="preview-modal-description">Identifies the Activity Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><a class="preview-modal-tag" href="/tags/cli reference">cli reference</a> <a class="preview-modal-tag" href="/tags/temporal cli">temporal cli</a> <a class="preview-modal-tag" href="/tags/activity id">activity id</a> <a class="preview-modal-tag" href="/tags/activity">activity</a> <a class="preview-modal-tag" href="/tags/activity execution">activity execution</a> <a class="preview-modal-tag" href="/tags/options-feature">options-feature</a> <a class="preview-modal-tag" href="/tags/command-line-interface-cli">command-line-interface-cli</a></div></div>

## fail

The `temporal activity fail` command fails an [Activity Execution](/activities#activity-execution) <span id="i-c88043e0-b69f-4ca3-b515-399087993054" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">i</span><div id="preview-modal-c88043e0-b69f-4ca3-b515-399087993054" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-c88043e0-b69f-4ca3-b515-399087993054" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp<a href="/activities#activity-execution">/activities#activity-execution</a></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is an Activity Execution?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">An Activity Execution is the full chain of Activity Task Executions.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><a class="preview-modal-tag" href="/tags/term">term</a> <a class="preview-modal-tag" href="/tags/explanation">explanation</a></div></div>.
The Activity must already be running on a valid [Workflow](/workflows#) <span id="i-f6061e11-037e-406d-90de-dfc788485bdd" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">i</span><div id="preview-modal-f6061e11-037e-406d-90de-dfc788485bdd" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-f6061e11-037e-406d-90de-dfc788485bdd" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp<a href="/workflows#">/workflows#</a></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">In day-to-day conversations, the term "Workflow" frequently denotes either a Workflow Type, a Workflow Definition, or a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><a class="preview-modal-tag" href="/tags/term">term</a> <a class="preview-modal-tag" href="/tags/explanation">explanation</a></div></div>.
`temporal fail --workflow-id=meaningful-business-id --activity-id=MyActivity`

Use the options listed below to change the behavior of this command.

- [--activity-id](/cli/cmd-options#activity-id) <span id="i-3ec4a887-7344-46a5-8b57-e3b0f110b7f8" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">i</span><div id="preview-modal-3ec4a887-7344-46a5-8b57-e3b0f110b7f8" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-3ec4a887-7344-46a5-8b57-e3b0f110b7f8" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp<a href="/cli/cmd-options#activity-id">/cli/cmd-options#activity-id</a></div><div class="preview-modal-title">temporal activity-id</div><div class="preview-modal-description">Identifies the Activity Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><a class="preview-modal-tag" href="/tags/cli reference">cli reference</a> <a class="preview-modal-tag" href="/tags/temporal cli">temporal cli</a> <a class="preview-modal-tag" href="/tags/activity id">activity id</a> <a class="preview-modal-tag" href="/tags/activity">activity</a> <a class="preview-modal-tag" href="/tags/activity execution">activity execution</a> <a class="preview-modal-tag" href="/tags/options-feature">options-feature</a> <a class="preview-modal-tag" href="/tags/command-line-interface-cli">command-line-interface-cli</a></div></div>

- [--detail](/cli/cmd-options#detail) <span id="i-7084c53d-515f-4a7c-aea5-ea3b7cfe66d0" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">i</span><div id="preview-modal-7084c53d-515f-4a7c-aea5-ea3b7cfe66d0" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-7084c53d-515f-4a7c-aea5-ea3b7cfe66d0" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview:</b>&nbsp;&nbsp<a href="/cli/cmd-options#detail">/cli/cmd-options#detail</a></div><div class="preview-modal-title">temporal detail</div><div class="preview-modal-description">Detail to fail the Activity.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><a class="preview-modal-tag" href="/tags/cli reference">cli reference</a> <a class="preview-modal-tag" href="/tags/temporal cli">temporal cli</a> <a class="preview-modal-tag" href="/tags/options-feature">options-feature</a> <a class="preview-modal-tag" href="/tags/command-line-interface-cli">command-line-interface-cli</a> <a class="preview-modal-tag" href="/tags/activity">activity</a> <a class="preview-modal-tag" href="/tags/failures">failures</a></div></div>
